resources.string: Check the SMS content using Google Gemini AI, it only requires a google account.

1. Register and login to your Google account:
https://accounts.google.com/

2. Open the API page:
https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey

3. Press the \"Create API key\" button.

4. Copy the key, then fill it in below.
Categorize this SMS message as Political, Fraud, Survey, or Marketing. If none applies, answer \"Valid\", otherwise, answer the category only, don\'t answer anything else. The SMS message is: {sms}
